entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump What is wrong w/you people? These are jobs that were lost due to the utter failure of this administrations horrible mishandling of COVID19. These are not new.
Perhaps we should call this TrumpFlu
